alert.note: Alert for Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 7:42PM EDT until July 27 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Washington County in Rhode Island... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 742 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ledyard Center, or 7 miles southeast of Norwich, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... South Kingstown, North Kingstown, Westerly, Narragansett, Hopkinton, Charlestown, Richmond and Exeter. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
